product.name: Herbs of Light California Poppy 1 oz Liquid
product.description: California poppy is flowering plant that is a known adaptogen, meaning it can help combat stress and promote relaxation. It may also improve the health of the adrenal system, which is responsible for managing hormonal responses to both internal and external stress. Additionally, California Poppy may promote sleeping, ease aches, and prevent disease of the bladder and liver.

product.name: Silymarin Liver Health Complex, Milk Thistle Extract with Curcumin, Artichoke, Dandelion, Ginger, Black Pepper, 360 Veggie Capsules by California Gold Nutrition
product.description: California Gold Nutrition Silymarin Complex Featuring Milk Thistle Extract plus Dandelion, Artichoke, Curcumin C3 Complex®, Ginger, and BioPerine® Supports Liver Health* Suitable for Vegetarians and Vegans Formulated without Gluten, GMOs, or Soy Produced in a 3rd Party Audited cGMP Registered (Certified) Facility 100% Gold Guarantee  Your liver plays a vital role in your body, as its main function is to filter the blood and remove any waste products or harmful toxins. For this reason, it’s important to take good care of your liver. California Gold Nutrition Silymarin Complex uses natural herbal extracts from milk thistle, turmeric, and other plants to help support liver health.* Milk Thistle Benefits Milk thistle (Silybum marianum ) is a flowering herb known for its potential health benefits. Silymarin, an extract taken from the seeds of the milk thistle plant, has antioxidant properties which may help protect the liver from certain toxins to promote a healthy detoxification process.* This supplement combines milk thistle with other liver-supporting and antioxidant-rich herbal extracts, like dandelion, turmeric, artichoke, and ginger to offer a full range of support for your liver.* California Gold Nutrition Silymarin Comple x is formulated with 5 herbal extracts and BioPerine®, a black pepper extract that helps improve absorption. It is suitable for vegetarians and vegans and formulated without gluten, GMOs, or soy. Third-Party Tested Our products undergo quality testing where they are evaluated by an independent ISO-certified lab using scientifically-validated test methods to ensure authenticity, purity, and potency of ingredients. For added transparency, we make the results available to you in our iTested Verified Reports so you can see for yourself. Check out the iTested Report  for this product to see the analysis.

product_reviews.review_text: I trust this brand of milk thistle extract.  And they combine it with a few other great herbs to amplify the results.  I often eat it straight out of the capsule and enjoy the little bit of heat that comes from the ginger and black pepper.  I highly recommend.

It helped me with a fatty liver. My son is non verbal one with Autism with past history of epileptic convulsion. He is otherwise pretty healthy, aged 24 years and gained lots of weight owing to high usage of several anti-epileptic drugs. Those drugs cause severe damages to his lever too. But thanks to this product, he  got rid of his fatty liver & bloating of his stomach in few months by just taking it. I also haven't stop taking it already for several months. It alleviates my lever issues owing to my age and occasional alcohol intake. I would like to recommend the product to all my acquaintances.

Thank you California Gold Nutrition for developing such a great combination for liver!
I took it for my mom, because she has alot of problems with cholesterol level included. She take alot of pills for cardiovascular system, so I decided to make a kind of detox for her organism. The size of the package let me forget about new purchases for the whole year! LOVE LOVE LOVE IT!

This Silymarin Complex has been great for supporting my liver health. The combination of milk thistle extract and other high-quality ingredients really works well together. The capsules are easy to take, and the quantity is perfect for daily use. I appreciate the inclusion of BioPerine for better absorption. Overall, it's a well-rounded supplement that I feel has been beneficial for my overall health. Highly recommended for anyone looking for a reliable liver support supplement!

Impressive quality, needed ingredients, perfect size, overall the highest quality supplement for maintaining womens metabolic health & to clear out the deficiency, it helps in the bone pain due to athritis, glucosamine is excellent for cartilage & joint mobility improvement, packaging was good, amazing mineral content, really benefited, Tastes good, also the composition of the bottle.

Excellent for liver health! decent size to swallow, decent price, and decent amounts of milk thistle PLUS dandelion and artichoke which protect your liver. The curcumin helps with inflammation and the bioperine helps with absorption. All in all, an excellent product by a reputable company

product_reviews.review_title: Outstanding Liver Support and Detox Formula!
product_reviews.review_text:
I've been using the California Gold Nutrition Silymarin Complex for liver support, and it has quickly become one of my favorite supplements! This product combines high-quality milk thistle extract with other powerful herbs like dandelion, artichoke, curcumin, and ginger, creating a comprehensive formula that supports liver health, digestion, and overall detoxification.

After just a few weeks of consistent use, I noticed a significant improvement in my digestion and a feeling of overall wellness. I appreciate that this supplement contains BioPerine for enhanced absorption, ensuring that my body is getting the full benefits of each ingredient. The capsules are easy to swallow and gentle on the stomach, with no unpleasant aftertaste.

With 360 veggie capsules, the value is unbeatable—it lasts a long time and offers a fantastic combination of ingredients that you don't often find in other liver support supplements. I highly recommend the California Gold Nutrition Silymarin Complex to anyone looking to enhance their liver function and boost overall health naturally. It's a game-changer!

These seem to be good quality with good ingredients. I got them for my adult daughter as her liver enzymes were high even though she doesn't drink alcohol much. The first tablet she took she passed worms. This must have been what was raising her enzymes. Great benefits but. I would recommend taking a binder with them.

This is my second time ordering this supplement. I take this supplement to support the health of my liver, gallbladder, and decrease cholesterol. I also have fibroids, melasma and insulin resistance and I wanted to support my liver detoxification. I understand that people with diabetes may develop fatty liver disease. The liver plays a vital role in skin care as well, as it detoxes the body. My doctor recommended milk thistle because it lowers blood sugar levels and promotes liver health.  I take two capsules daily—one in the morning and one at night and I can clearly feel the difference in my energy. body condition and general well-being.

After using the Silymarin Complex for a month, I'm impressed with its effectiveness. The combination of milk thistle, dandelion, and artichoke really seems to support liver health and detoxification. The capsules are small and easy to take, and I've noticed a marked improvement in my overall well-being without any side effects.
I take this everyday, usually after dinner and it helps me go to the washroom. I love the added benefits of detoxing my liver. Doesn't upset my tummy either.

i've been using it for several months and I feel a big difference. Before I was feeling pains from my liver (I know it's fatty liver) but they disappeared just a few days after I started using it and they never returned
Bought it during the 28th anniversary and got a great discount!  It's part of my liver detox stack.  Brings down my liver enzymes and good for detox too!

This is a superior product.  It has ALL important ingredients in generous amounts for liver health to succeed.  The price is also LESS compared to several other liver health/cleanse products marketed online.
The contents of this product and the price point is really value for money and i highly recommend it. I love it that they have it in bigger bottles too.
I'm glad I chose the composition to be really good, and I took it to support my health because I needed to improve the function of the gallbladder and liver
This is one of the best product I came through. The quality is good and ingredients are also very good. The packaging is good. There is no after taste.

I use it for general body detox and I found it very good, could see improvement in skin and overall wellbeing within a few weeks. Excellent size, lasts a long time, good quality ingredients, packaging and no aftertaste.
Recommend it

comes with a large bottle which will last about a year, which is convenient, also like it that it is one per day so it is easy to remember, i like the ingredients which has all the useful herbs inside

Quality stuff and seems the ingredient is adequate. 

Good pricing for the content size and taste is as expected.

Packaging is well and benefit and all are as expected for my liver

I was using the California Gold Nutrition Silymarin Complex for a few weeks, and I noticed an improvement in my digestion. The blend of milk thistle, dandelion, artichoke, curcumin, and ginger seems to work well together, and I appreciate the inclusion of BioPerine for better absorption. The capsules are easy to swallow, and there's no unpleasant aftertaste.

Good ingredient and quality, I always take milk thistle because I drink alcohol and need some detox once or twice a week. Small size for easy swallow. Great supplement for liver health. Nice packaging and no taste. It is a must supplement for me as I liver rate goes high some time a year.

This is by far the best value I've been able to find among Milk Thistle supplements.  It has the highest concentration of Silymarin per capsule of any other product I've encountered, plus it contains an impressively comprehensive array of additional synergistic liver-supporting ingredients.  And the results I've experienced since I started taking it are simply unparalleled - talk about bang for your buck!

product_reviews.review_text: This is a wonderful liver formula from the very trusted iHerb brand that is known for its high quality products at a great value. I would recommend this formula for anyone looking to detox from the harmful effects of alcohol on the liver. This is an excellent formula with the right dosages and proportions of the most powerful liver herbs. I would definitely recommend this formula for liver rejuvenation and anything from this brand in general for its great value and quality.
California Gold is high quality and trustworthy.  I'm supplement my cleanse with this to not over work my kidneys or liver.  There have been no side effects or bad taste.

This is a powerhouse supplement for liver detox! I've noticed better digestion and less bloating after meals. The combination of herbs is impressive, and I feel like it's helping me cleanse my system gently. Great product

I've been taking this for a while and while I don't know how effective it is, I think it's working for the most part or my liver numbers wouldn't be as good as they are with the amount of pain pills I take! So I think it's helping.

Got blood work done prior to taking this supplement and after finishing up the bottle - an improvement in the asat and alat results is evident, which I attribute to this complex. Repurchased right away.

since I take some medicine for a month, I just wanted to protect my liver just in case~ My liver somatic index shows good number. maybe I am just healthy enough or maybe this helps not sure, but so far so good

I took it first time it was ok only disturbed sleep, when i took it the next day it caused me SEVERE headaches and nausea, i felt so sick, it triggered anxiety too and made me really jittery, this is definitely not for me..

This supplement is a fantastic blend of milk thistle extract, dandelion, artichoke, turmeric C3 complex, ginger, and BioPerine. It's designed to support liver health and detoxification. Suitable for vegetarians and free from gluten, GMOs, and soy, it's a great choice for those looking to maintain a healthy liver with natural ingredients.

Within a few weeks of consistent use, I noticed a remarkable improvement in my overall well-being. My energy levels have increased, and I feel less fatigued throughout the day. Additionally, my digestion has improved, and I experience less bloating and discomfort after meals. The silymarin complex is clearly doing an excellent job of supporting my liver and overall health.

California Gold Nutrition Silymarin Complex offers a powerful blend of milk thistle extract, dandelion, artichoke, curcumin, ginger, and BioPerine. The 120 veggie capsules provide a generous supply of this potent formula. I appreciate the well-rounded mix of ingredients that support liver health and overall wellness. The capsules are easy to swallow and the formula has been effective in aiding digestion and detoxification. The packaging is solid, ensuring the capsules remain fresh. Highly recommend for anyone looking for comprehensive liver support.

I ordered these capsules because I was looking for something for liver detox and these capsules have all the best ingredients for that. I couldn't find any other supplement for liver detox with these ingredients. I love the quality of these capsules, as well as the size of the package!

Read that supplement is beneficial for liver cleanse hence i got it. ingredient list seems quality as with the dosage. package is well packed. slight aftertaste and easy to ingest overall. probably need to take it for some time to notice Amy difference

milk thistle is quality ingredient for liver detox great supplement it has no taste as it's in capsules,it can be effective for bile secretion, for max absorption try on empty stomach , average size jar as regular one health benefits are countless not so durable packaging, overall very nice

product_reviews.review_title: Love the extra ingredients with Milk Thistle
product_reviews.review_text: I take this product daily to detox my liver...I feel the extra ingredients added are a benefit too,  One capsule per day, easy to take, and I have not experienced any side effects.  I love the detox products from iHerb, we all need them with the foods we eat and the environment we live in today!

I have been taking California Gold Nutrition's Silymarin Complex for a few months now, and I am thoroughly impressed with the results. This supplement has exceeded my expectations in multiple ways, earning a well-deserved 5-star rating.

Effectiveness:
The combination of milk thistle extract, dandelion, artichoke, Curcumin C3 Complex, ginger, and BioPerine is exceptionally well-formulated. I've noticed a significant improvement in my liver health and overall digestion. The milk thistle and dandelion work synergistically to support liver function, while the Curcumin C3 Complex and ginger help reduce inflammation and promote better digestion.

Quality:
California Gold Nutrition is known for its high-quality products, and this Silymarin Complex is no exception. The ingredients are clearly of premium quality, and I appreciate that the product is free from unnecessary fillers and additives. The veggie capsules are easy to swallow and gentle on the stomach.

Value:
With 120 veggie capsules per bottle, this supplement offers great value for money. Taking just two capsules a day means the bottle lasts for two months, which is quite economical considering the wide range of benefits it provides.

Packaging:
The packaging is robust and well-designed, ensuring the capsules stay fresh. The clear labeling provides all the necessary information about the supplement, making it easy to understand the benefits and dosage.

contains important and good quality detox ingredients ( including milk thistle, dandelion, artichoke, curcumin) small sized  and easy to swallow capsules, this supplement makes detoxing easy, no taste, supportive of the liver and bile production, medium sized plastic bottle , sealed package, detoxing every 3-6 months benefits your health, reasonable price with great combination of detox ingredients.

product_reviews.review_title: Comprehensive Liver Support with Silymarin Complex
product_reviews.review_text:
California Gold Nutrition's Silymarin Complex is a top-quality supplement designed for comprehensive liver support and detoxification. This product combines potent ingredients such as milk thistle extract, dandelion, artichoke, curcumin, ginger, and BioPerine, ensuring maximum absorption and effectiveness.

Each capsule is filled with high-quality ingredients that aid in liver detox and promote healthy bile production. Since incorporating this supplement into my routine, I have noticed significant benefits in my liver function and overall wellness. The 360 veggie capsules come in a well-sized package, providing an extended supply that fits seamlessly into my daily regimen.

The capsules are easy to swallow and have no unpleasant taste, making them a convenient addition to any diet. The inclusion of BioPerine enhances the absorption of the other ingredients, ensuring you receive the full benefit of each component.

For those looking to support liver health and detoxification, California Gold Nutrition's Silymarin Complex is an excellent choice.

Pros:

High-quality ingredients like milk thistle extract and curcumin
Promotes liver health and detoxification
Supports healthy bile production
Enhanced absorption with BioPerine
Convenient 360-capsule package
Easy-to-swallow veggie capsules with no unpleasant taste

I tried this vitamin product for two months as prescribed, hoping to see some positive effects. Despite the quality ingredients and the appropriate dosage, I didn't notice any change or improvement in my overall health or well-being. The size of the tablets was manageable, and the taste was acceptable, but unfortunately, I didn't experience any of the advertised benefits. Based on my experience, I wouldn't recommend this product.

Take this every day to support liver and gallbladder health. Taken with a meal as milk thistle is fat solluble. Also take it with apple cider vinegar. As I take this to support long-term health I can not speak to its effect from short term experience.

California Gold is a brand I trust for its commitment to quality and transparency, and knowing that I'm taking a product free from harmful additives gives me peace of mind. Supporting my liver health has positively impacted my skin, reducing occasional breakouts and giving me a healthier complexion. This has been a wonderful added benefit that I wasn't expecting.
I highly recommend this combining with other like liver kidney from organic India.

product_reviews.review_title: Tablets could be smaller otherwise excellent.
product_reviews.review_text:
But I understand it would not fit inside smaller capsule. 
But I think Sylimarin will not take so much space. Otherwise, I am content, Feeling slightly different (better) as overal detox power of liver is increasing.
As a bonus product contains piperine, which is awesome in connection with multivitamins.  Other things are there only for commertional, it dont even make 1% difference in my opinion, because there are too little amounts. But piperine is still kinda ok to work (10mg would be better).
As I cannot review quality of Sylimarin, because I dont have laboratory, I rate it 5 stars.

Good product loved it omg and i am doing this review because iherb sent me a mail after my recent purchase and told me for every product i review they will give me 1 dollar so yes i am forcefully writing this review and Copy pasting it with the other products that i purchased

product_reviews.review_title: A Game-Changer for My Wellness Routine 🌟
product_reviews.review_text:
I've been using the California Gold's Silymarin/Milk Thistle supplement for a few months now, and I'm genuinely impressed with the results. This supplement has become a staple in my daily wellness routine, and here's why:

Liver Health Support: As someone who is conscious about maintaining liver health, especially with a busy lifestyle, this supplement has been a game-changer. Silymarin, the active ingredient in milk thistle, is well-known for its liver-protective properties. Since incorporating it into my routine, I've noticed a significant improvement in my overall energy levels and digestion, which I attribute to better liver function.

I think I may have been allergic to something in this formula. I wanted to try this due to high liver enzymes but every single time I took the product, my allergies went crazy. Runny nose, sneezing, watery eyes. Very strange. Wish it would have worked for me but it just did not.

This supplement is a fantastic blend of milk thistle extract, dandelion, artichoke, turmeric C3 complex, ginger, and BioPerine. It's designed to support liver health and detoxification. Suitable for vegetarians and free from gluten, GMOs, and soy, it's a great choice for those looking to maintain a healthy liver with natural ingredients.

California Gold Nutrition Silymarin Complex offers a powerful blend of milk thistle extract, dandelion, artichoke, curcumin, ginger, and BioPerine. The 120 veggie capsules provide a generous supply of this potent formula. I appreciate the well-rounded mix of ingredients that support liver health and overall wellness. The capsules are easy to swallow and the formula has been effective in aiding digestion and detoxification. The packaging is solid, ensuring the capsules remain fresh. Highly recommend for anyone looking for comprehensive liver support.

I've been using California Gold Nutrition's Silymarin Complex, which includes Milk Thistle Extract, Dandelion, Artichoke, Curcumin C3 Complex, Ginger, and BioPerine, and I'm extremely pleased with the results. This supplement has greatly supported my liver health, thanks to its high-quality ingredients and thoughtful formulation.

Key Benefits:

	1.	Liver Support and Detoxification: The combination of milk thistle, dandelion, artichoke, curcumin, and ginger works synergistically to promote liver detoxification and support healthy liver function. Since starting this supplement, I've noticed improvements in my digestion and overall gut health  .
	2.	Convenience: Instead of taking multiple supplements separately, this all-in-one formula makes it convenient to get all the necessary ingredients in one capsule. It's particularly useful for someone with a busy schedule like mine  .
	3.	High Quality and Easy to Use: The capsules are small, easy to swallow, and have no unpleasant taste. The addition of BioPerine enhances the absorption of the ingredients, making the supplement more effective  .

Overall, I highly recommend California Gold Nutrition's Silymarin Complex for anyone looking to support their liver health and overall detoxification. It's an excellent product with a blend of beneficial herbs that provide comprehensive support for the liver  .

It arrived in a box in safe packaging. It is not hard to swallow and a good supplement for liver health. It has no after taste and good for detox. It also has a long expiration date which I can use for a long time. Its complex ingredients makes it more effective for use.

This is my favorite supplement for supporting liver, gallbladder, and overall detox. It combines several herbs that I used to purchase individually. I only take one capsule a day, and it helps my bile flow, improving digestion. The silymarin complex effectively removes toxins from the body, and overall, it has improved my gut health. This bottle lasts a year and is reasonably priced. I highly recommend it. If you found my review helpful, please press like

These capsules are easy to swallow which is important to me as I tend to struggle with that issue. These are an easy size for me to manage, but it packs a mighty combo of ingredients. I'm happy to take one supplement that covers so many items that are beneficial to my health and a feeling of well-being. These work well and benefit my liver I'm going to keep taking them.

I always trust California gold when it comes to quality of the ingredients. I like using this mixture because it contains many different great supplements for your liver and for detox in one conveniently sized capsule.  The capsules are not too large in size and are easy to swallow and they have no taste.

I have been taking California Gold Nutrition's Silymarin Complex for a few months now, and I am thoroughly impressed with the results. This supplement has exceeded my expectations in multiple ways, earning a well-deserved 5-star rating.

Effectiveness:
The combination of milk thistle extract, dandelion, artichoke, Curcumin C3 Complex, ginger, and BioPerine is exceptionally well-formulated. I've noticed a significant improvement in my liver health and overall digestion. The milk thistle and dandelion work synergistically to support liver function, while the Curcumin C3 Complex and ginger help reduce inflammation and promote better digestion.

Quality:
California Gold Nutrition is known for its high-quality products, and this Silymarin Complex is no exception. The ingredients are clearly of premium quality, and I appreciate that the product is free from unnecessary fillers and additives. The veggie capsules are easy to swallow and gentle on the stomach.

Value:
With 120 veggie capsules per bottle, this supplement offers great value for money. Taking just two capsules a day means the bottle lasts for two months, which is quite economical considering the wide range of benefits it provides.

Packaging:
The packaging is robust and well-designed, ensuring the capsules stay fresh. The clear labeling provides all the necessary information about the supplement, making it easy to understand the benefits and dosage.

product_reviews.review_text:

Liver Health Support: As someone who is conscious about maintaining liver health, especially with a busy lifestyle, this supplement has been a game-changer. Silymarin, the active ingredient in milk thistle, is well-known for its liver-protective properties. Since incorporating it into my routine, I've noticed a significant improvement in my overall energy levels and digestion, which I attribute to better liver function.

This supplement is a fantastic blend of milk thistle extract, dandelion, artichoke, turmeric C3 complex, ginger, and BioPerine. It's designed to support liver health and detoxification. The capsules are easy to swallow and the formula has been effective in aiding digestion and detoxification. The packaging is solid, ensuring the capsules remain fresh. Highly recommend for anyone looking for comprehensive liver support.

I've been using California Gold Nutrition's Silymarin Complex, which includes Milk Thistle Extract, Dandelion, Artichoke, Curcumin C3 Complex, Ginger, and BioPerine, and I'm extremely pleased with the results. This supplement has greatly supported my liver health, thanks to its high-quality ingredients and thoughtful formulation.

Key Benefits:

	1.	Liver Support and Detoxification: The combination of milk thistle, dandelion, artichoke, curcumin, and ginger works synergistically to promote liver detoxification and support healthy liver function. Since starting this supplement, I've noticed improvements in my digestion and overall gut health  .
	2.	Convenience: Instead of taking multiple supplements separately, this all-in-one formula makes it convenient to get all the necessary ingredients in one capsule. It's particularly useful for someone with a busy schedule like mine  .
	3.	High Quality and Easy to Use: The capsules are small, easy to swallow, and have no unpleasant taste. The addition of BioPerine enhances the absorption of the ingredients, making the supplement more effective  .

Overall, I highly recommend California Gold Nutrition's Silymarin Complex for anyone looking to support their liver health and overall detoxification. It's an excellent product with a blend of beneficial herbs that provide comprehensive support for the liver  .

It arrived in a box in safe packaging. It is not hard to swallow and a good supplement for liver health. It has no after taste and good for detox. It also has a long expiration date which I can use for a long time. Its complex ingredients makes it more effective for use.

I really don't like writing bad reviews, but this is unfortunately a really bad product. I've tried different spirulina brands, it's natural taste is "not pleasant" to put it mildly, but this brand unfortunately manages to really make the barely palatable into almost totally unpalatable. There is especially this odd sour taste that almost makes you gag, and which I never experienced in other brands. 

If you really want to spot the difference, try the other brand that sources its Spirulina from India as well. That brand isn't the best either, but it is miles ahead of this one.

The awful taste makes you question could indicate quality issues, so I wonder if you really are getting the benefits you are supposed to be getting from Spirulina with this product? I bought two bags because of this product because usually California Gold products are of good quality, or at least decent. However in this case, I truly regret this purchase. Don't make the same mistake, pay a little more for that other brand that sources it from India.

Spirulina is a type of blue-green algae that grows in both salt and fresh water. It is highly nutritious and a great source of protein, copper, and B vitamins. It is easy to put in smoothies and juices as it is a powder form. This is one of my favorite superfoods.

product_reviews.review_title: A Green Powerhouse: My Take on SUPERFOODS Organic Spirulina Powder
product_reviews.review_text: In my quest for a healthier lifestyle, I discovered SUPERFOODS Organic Spirulina Powder, 8.5 oz (240 g), and decided to integrate it into my daily nutrition. Spirulina, a type of blue-green algae, is famed for its impressive nutrient profile and health benefits. Here's my experience after incorporating this superfood into my routine for the past couple of months.Taste and Texture: Spirulina has a distinctive, somewhat "fishy" taste, which can be off-putting to some. However, when mixed into smoothies, juices, or even yogurts, its flavor becomes almost imperceptible. The powder itself is fine and blends well, although it does turn everything a deep shade of green.Nutritional Benefits: This spirulina powder is a nutritional powerhouse, rich in protein, vitamins (especially B vitamins), minerals (including iron and magnesium), and antioxidants. I started taking it to boost my energy levels and support my immune system, and I've definitely noticed a difference. My energy has been more consistent, and I've felt generally healthier and more resilient against common colds.Ease of Use: The powder format is incredibly versatile. I've experimented with adding it to various dishes and drinks. My favorite way to consume it is blended into a morning smoothie with fruits, which masks the taste while still delivering all the benefits.Effectiveness: It's hard to quantify the effect of any one supplement, but I can say that since adding spirulina powder to my diet, I've noticed an overall improvement in my energy and vitality. It's also been a great way to ensure I get a broad spectrum of nutrients in my diet, especially on days when my vegetable intake is less than optimal.Digestibility: I was initially concerned about potential digestive issues, as spirulina is quite high in fiber, but I've had no adverse effects. It seems to have actually contributed positively to my digestive health.Value: Given the density of nutrients and the amount of product you get, I find this spirulina powder to offer excellent value for money. It's an affordable and efficient way to supplement a healthy diet.Final Verdict: SUPERFOODS Organic Spirulina Powder has earned a permanent spot in my pantry. It's an easy, effective way to boost my nutritional intake, and I appreciate the versatility and health benefits it offers. For anyone looking to enhance their diet with a nutrient-rich superfood, I highly recommend giving this spirulina powder a try.

I use this powder in my smoothies and like it! It seems to be of good quality-it's a rich dark green color and good consistency. It blends well (in a smoothie, I've not done it only in liquid) and the packaging makes it fairly convenient to use and store. Expect green fingertips but it's worth it.
Absolutely amazing product.  The results won't make you wait long.  Can be seen after 3 months of taking it

I appreciate California Gold Nutrition's commitment to organic sourcing. Knowing that I'm consuming a pure and clean spirulina powder without additives or fillers adds an extra layer of confidence in my health journey. Since integrating it into my diet, I've noticed improved energy levels and an overall sense of well-being.

Tastes like normal Spirulina :p Difficult to say whether or not the quality is better than others, but I like that it's USDA Organic. Very good price point for it being organic and 240g (this pouch will last a longgg time). Recommend and will likely buy again.

Spirulina undoubtedly offers numerous health benefits, but for me, capsules are the preferred option over the powder form. The taste of spirulina powder is overpowering and unpleasant, regardless of what it's mixed with. Additionally, the smell is quite strong, which can be off-putting. If you don't mind these aspects, then the powder form might work well for you. However, I personally found it challenging to consume. As a result, I opted to switch to capsules, which offer all the benefits of spirulina without the taste and smell drawbacks. Overall, while spirulina is a beneficial supplement, choosing the right form is essential for a positive experience.

The advantages of this algae are remarkable. In terms of taste, it's quite potent, mirroring its effects. I appreciate the minimal plastic in the packaging, but I dislike how messy it gets when served, especially since the bag tends to break from repeated opening and closing. I wish they offered it in pill form instead of powder.

I've bought several California Gold Nutrition supplements and thus far have been happy with the ingredients as well as taste and price.  Bought this being it's considered a superfood with lots of good nutrients in it.  It mixes well with protein powder as well as in my dogs raw food, yep I also give this to my dog to keep her healthy even tho she gets raw. She hasn't complained about the taste, lol.
I read on another brand I was looking to try out and it came with a warning label something about cancer causing, so didn't buy that product and stuck with California Gold Nutrition.  Good size for the price with quality ingredients.

This is my first time buying Spirulina from this brand but it's iHerb's brand so I have no worries or concerns. iHerb products are always with high quality ingredients. I love the size of the package and that this was on sale during the Christmas. Spirulina is my go to superfood for detoxing which I will be doing after everything I ate this Christmas season. Happy to find one that's not sourced from China and in my favorite trusted brand iHerb.

product_reviews.review_title: A Green Powerhouse: My Take on SUPERFOODS Organic Spirulina Powder
product_reviews.review_text: In my quest for a healthier lifestyle, I discovered SUPERFOODS Organic Spirulina Powder, 8.5 oz (240 g), and decided to integrate it into my daily nutrition. Spirulina, a type of blue-green algae, is famed for its impressive nutrient profile and health benefits. Here's my experience after incorporating this superfood into my routine for the past couple of months.Taste and Texture: Spirulina has a distinctive, somewhat "fishy" taste, which can be off-putting to some. However, when mixed into smoothies, juices, or even yogurts, its flavor becomes almost imperceptible. The powder itself is fine and blends well, although it does turn everything a deep shade of green.Nutritional Benefits: This spirulina powder is a nutritional powerhouse, rich in protein, vitamins (especially B vitamins), minerals (including iron and magnesium), and antioxidants. I started taking it to boost my energy levels and support my immune system, and I've definitely noticed a difference. My energy has been more consistent, and I've felt generally healthier and more resilient against common colds.Ease of Use: The powder format is incredibly versatile. I've experimented with adding it to various dishes and drinks. My favorite way to consume it is blended into a morning smoothie with fruits, which masks the taste while still delivering all the benefits.Effectiveness: It's hard to quantify the effect of any one supplement, but I can say that since adding spirulina powder to my diet, I've noticed an overall improvement in my energy and vitality. It's also been a great way to ensure I get a broad spectrum of nutrients in my diet, especially on days when my vegetable intake is less than optimal.Digestibility: I was initially concerned about potential digestive issues, as spirulina is quite high in fiber, but I've had no adverse effects. It seems to have actually contributed positively to my digestive health.Value: Given the density of nutrients and the amount of product you get, I find this spirulina powder to offer excellent value for money. It's an affordable and efficient way to supplement a healthy diet.Final Verdict: SUPERFOODS Organic Spirulina Powder has earned a permanent spot in my pantry. It's an easy, effective way to boost my nutritional intake, and I appreciate the versatility and health benefits it offers. For anyone looking to enhance their diet with a nutrient-rich superfood, I highly recommend giving this spirulina powder a try.

Blue-green algae Superfood and good quality ingredients,  It seems to be of good quality-it's a rich dark green color and good consistency. Spirulina is nutritious and Packaging is convenient.

The  quantity of this product is great for me. I use this to make daily green smoothies

convenient and easy to use. The taste is not too bad for me

I bought this for my husband, he likes to take the powder form rather than the capsule form.   He added one or two spoonfuls to make the smoothies daily.  He said he liked it.   The price is good for this organic and big-package product.  Highly recommend it!

California Gold Nutrition's Organic Spirulina Powder in the 8.5 oz (240 g) container is a powerhouse of nutrition that has become an integral part of my daily wellness routine. The organic certification assures me of its purity and quality. I appreciate the versatility of this powder, easily blending into smoothies, juices, or even sprinkled over meals for an added nutritional boost. The 240 g quantity provides a generous supply, ensuring long-lasting benefits. Since incorporating this spirulina powder into my diet, I've experienced increased energy levels and overall well-being. California Gold Nutrition consistently delivers on quality, making their Organic Spirulina Powder a reliable choice for those seeking optimal nutrition.
